description: Specific options for point in selected states, after being selected by allowPointSelect or programmatically.

children.name: animation
children.description: Animation setting for hovering the graph in line-type series.

children.name: enabled
children.description: Enable separate styles for the hovered series to visualize that the user hovers either the series itself or the legend.

children.name: lineWidth
children.description: Pixel width of the graph line. By default this property is undefined, and the lineWidthPlus property dictates how much to increase the linewidth from normal state.

children.name: lineWidthPlus
children.description: The additional line width for the graph of a hovered series.

children.name: marker
children.description: In Highcharts 1.0, the appearance of all markers belonging to the hovered series. For settings on the hover state of the individual point, see marker.states.hover.
